title: [Suggestion] New design of the wiki
description:
Hey there,

let me share my suggestion of an new "Design" after the little disscussion on IC2-Forum.

Probably the Wiki goes to be confusing with the different GT4 (1.6.4) and GT5 (1.7.2) versions.
What do you think about a general separation of GT4 and GT5 in the navigation bar?
I think one picture says more than 1.000 words. -> http://i.imgur.com/Rkl3Ext.png

Greets
Sepp

replies.body: We are considering making a new wiki for Gregtech 5 rather than trying to squish (and overwrite) more stuff into this one.
There are 3 current options: Squish/combine, Reconstruct, and Irony.  None of the three are in or out yet.
Yep. Or like the offer to go to the FTB-Wiki.
For anyone reading this, we decided to put all the 1.7+ stuff on the FTB wiki (http://wiki.feed-the-beast.com/GregTech)
